website_summaries.verdict: This little candy-colored boombox packs a more impressive sound than you’d expect, especially considering its low price.
pros: Plays CDs, FM radio, and Bluetooth-connected devices
cons: Unable to pick up AM radio stations

customer_reviews.title: easy to use Cons
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we've given this boom box a try. The first time each function systematically broke, we chalked it up to being a dud. But I wish we didn't give it a second try! Here we are, once again, a few months after purchasing and parts are starting to break. Pros: small size, easy to use Cons: CHEAP and breaks easily Parts or functions that have broken on this model: power button, Power cord, headphone jack, power from batteries Dear Amazon, it's time to stop selling this junk. We're looking into a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the reviews can't be trusted. This feels and looks cheap and the video I uploaded shows the sound it makes when you set it to Bluetooth. I needed a CD player to learn a language so it will suit my needs but if you want to use it as a Bluetooth speaker I advise seeking another product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cherk

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT size great features.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, really good sound for a small unit. Nice features and bright LCD screen. Runs on both batteries or a chord included. Great for taking anywhere when you don't want to have to bother using your computer to play music and drag that around risking damage to it, like on the beach etc. This thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Coinhunter

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: this little guy is the real deal.For the price you can,t go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is small, but I was surprised the sound quality is excellant. Simple to operate, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product
customer_reviews.text: I let a CD play for a few minutes (sound quality seemed to be pretty decent) before trying out the other modes to make sure they worked. They worked fine but when I went back to CD mode, the CD would never play again. I tried powering off and powering back on but that didn't work. The plastic material seemed to be cheap -- not durable at all. The reviews on this product seemed to be 50/50 but I took a chance anyway. I ended up on the losing end on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised what great sound this little unit has. It has nice features and love the blue light and you can use batteries with this also, This will be great during hurricane season. It is a nice looking little unit, but can't figure out how to pair my jam speaker to this. Any ideas?
customer_reviews.author: IcyStar

customer_reviews.title: Nice CD player
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this long so I can't answer the durability question, but this looks exactly like the picture and so far it plays CDs wonderfully. I wanted something small to go in my kitchen that also blended well with the rest of the colors (gray and white). This CD player fit that need perfectly. I'm happy with this purchase and if anything changes I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Dead in Less Than One Month
customer_reviews.text: I should have yielded to the reviews for this product. It worked fine...for about a week. It sits on a high shelf out of reach of children, used solely for bedtime sound. Imagine my disappointment as first, the CD player stopped working, then the FM radio, and finally it wouldn't power up at all. Highly recommend seeking out a different device. If this weren't pink, I might have 'listened' better to the reviewers before me. Kudos, though, to Amazon for helping with refund resolution - one big reason I keep returning...even the 'bad gambles' turn out all right in the end.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. First of all, it is a bluetooth machine that actually works! I have had so many crappy bluetooth devices. This one is great. It also has all of the bells and whistles that I need in a small package: Tuner, cd player, aux in, headphone jack. I bought this for my music classroom and it is plenty loud for a large space and 30 kids at a time. I plan on buying a second for my nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable for all music connections
customer_reviews.text: Great size for our office. Blends in on black table. Good sound, not spectacular but we have it low and when we bring it outside for something louder it's potable & great. Bluetooth or wire connection to my music plus a radio & CD player. Allows versatility.
customer_reviews.author: JDinNH

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, good sound, fantastic battery life with well over 140hrs of radio time with type C batteries from the dollar store (batteries still going)! Downside? Thing slowly broke over the course of a month. First the cd player stopped then the radio started to go. Will get reception for a minute and stop. Never tested the bluetooth but thing is basically a paperweight now after just over a month. I got a refund... Maybe others lucked out on their product but we sure hadnt and we dont seem to be the only one. We bought a second one as a xmas gift right before it started to completely breakdown so well see how that one fairs...
customer_reviews.author: battleponcho

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This player is a piece of junk! It's true you get what you pay for and I wish I'd paid attention to the negative reviews before I bought it. It skips, or spins cd around making strange noises or won't play at all. I've tried several CDs so it's not a damaged cd and yes, the cd is firmly in place. I also purchased the Assurant protection plan another thing not to buy! I've had no luck getting in touch with them. Negative experience all around.
customer_reviews.author: rogersgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very excited about this CD player... I just returned another, for poor sound and you hear the disc spinning. This CD player is great...very loud, has Bluetooth, can’t hear disc spinning, portable and cute! Love the gold & black! I would say after searching and purchasing another that was low quality, this is a great buy! I give it 5 stars and would recommend it! Happy in Castle Rock, Colorado!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Cute Box. Great Sound.
customer_reviews.text: This was a delightful surprise to find the DVD sound quality so excellent. Everyone who hears it remarks on it.
customer_reviews.author: Hollingsworth Gessler

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a while but then the CD player quit ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a while but then the CD player quit working (just like everyone else the whole reason I purchased was for the CD player - needed something small and compact to fit on my desk). I thought I broke the player by moving it around but after reading the reviews I no longer believe I am the problem and I almost purchased another but have no faith in this product. It is cute, compact, the sound was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Contains lead and hazardous materials
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler to use, but it has warnings about lead exposure on the package. How can this even be sold? I would never knowingly bring something into my home that exposes my family to lead and other hazardous materials. I'm returning it immediately. Thanks California, for the warning label. The seller should update the listing to include this information to save people time and shipping.
customer_reviews.author: inaccessiblerail

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to be able to sync it in my car because I don't have a CD player and I'm not smart enough to figure how how to put my music ...
customer_reviews.text: It's just OK. Plus: the size. I wanted something small and portable. Plus: Bluetooth. I wanted to be able to sync it in my car because I don't have a CD player and I'm not smart enough to figure how how to put my music on a thumb drive. Negative: for $50 I would like a better sound. It has a Bass button but the sound is that of a cheap speaker - a bit muffled. I prefer the sound of my computer speakers. Negative: floppy antenna. I'd prefer the solid antena that pulls out. Plus: ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Shilts

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great and it is small enough I can carry it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play audio books on. The sound is great and it is small enough I can carry it where ever I want to use it as I put batteries in it so do not depend on a wall outlet. It is compact and doesn't take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound
customer_reviews.text: We needed the product to listen the CD audio books for our trip. The product worked well for this. We have a DC to AC converter so it worked well. The FM section was poor on sound. It has no AM radio, that is a drawback for us. The blue tooth had little range. But we bought it for the CD player for books and that worked well. Many new cars do not have CD players any more, this is the answer for that inadequacy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my CDs
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a month or so but then began to ruin my cds by leaving a round scratch and now they skip
customer_reviews.author: kwb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't read CD-RW
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and the size is perfect. However, it does not play CD-RW as advertised. I tried different ones and it didn't work. I got it for my sister's bday, but I decided to test it too late and is now more than 30 days and I don't think I can exchange it. I guess we can use it for the original CDs only. She was looking for something small, so she'll like it. Good sound.
customer_reviews.author: BlueMoon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product zero stars, if I could.It broke after 1 week of use. Worthless. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia R

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a 3-year old; Considering one for myself
customer_reviews.text: No, it's not a Bose player--but it's small, easy-to-use, compact, and inexpensive. My 3-year old grandson learned to use it quickly, and it's a handy player for childhood song CDs. It's a wonderful alternative to streaming music; he can have music anywhere with this adorable portable unit. I have a large, bulky CD player in my kitchen and plan to replace it with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio, just what I was looking for to leave music on for my cat while I am away. I'm also listening to radio more now myself since I bought this. Compact, yet good sound and great reception. Just exactly what I needed for my purpose. Easy and simple controls to use....love it. Very happy with this purchase. Perfect size, takes up less counter space plus it looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A WORD TO THE WISE:
customer_reviews.text: 1.) No clock function...therefore., mes amis, you CANNOT set it to shut off, automatically, after you fall asleep. 2.) After a CD is fully played, the turn-table will NOT stop spinning on its' own. 3.) Radio is ONLY FM.
customer_reviews.author: Amelie Renoncule

customer_reviews.title: *VERY* disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset about spending any money on this, let alone almost $50!! I bought this last year in preparation for my baby's arrival and now that she is sleeping in her own room, I went to plug it in the other day and it just goes on and off constantly. I tried different things to see if I could get it to stop turning off and on, but nothing helped. I cannot believe that it just doesn't work at all!!
customer_reviews.author: LanneyG

customer_reviews.title: a good CD player, but
customer_reviews.text: The CD player is very good however, I bought it for the bluetooth option so I could use my JBL speakers, unable to use Jensen CD player with JBL bluetooth speaker, because the player needs an access code to connect to the speaker. There is no way to connect to them. However JBL informed me that I can use a twin headphone jack and connect it directly to the JBL. this is what I did, works and sounds great. disappointed in the bluetooth though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boombox! Excellent Sound!  5 stars!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this great sized boombox for my nightstand to listen to the dramatic bible presentation - has terrific sound you can plug it in to electric outlet or use batteries - has a plug for headphones. Couldn't ask for simpler use. Allows you to see tracks and pause and go forward and backward and see number you are on in the window. Perfect machine. Great price too. Excellent spacesaver size. Five gold stars and two thumbs up. So glad I bought it. Just what I was looking for. Thks Amazon - you did it again!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cindy e.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cube of sound!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. All I can say is, "Wow." This little cube is great! After being disappointed with a recent boombox purchase I was skeptical. The sound from this is great, considering it's size! Bright display and LED's, Bluetooth works good, top-loading CD has proper finger holes for extracting CD's easily. If I were to complain about anything it would be that there's no "random" program mode for CD's, and it would be nice if the AM/FM tuning dial had a light so you could see it in the dark, but these are really nit-picks. No complaints from this great little unit.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gruenenwald

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this player so he could listen to audio books on cd but still plug in his iPod for music and occasionally listen to the radio. Perfect for a kid or anyone who doesn't need something fancy. It is priced appropriately for what you get. Like other reviewers said, there is a weird static sound whenever the radio is quiet, as if the cd player is turning constantly (even though it is off & you are listening to the radio) but my son said he doesn't care. It would be annoying to most adults & apparently is not fixable. My son loves how it looks in his room (he has the red one). Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harrison

customer_reviews.title: CD player died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the CD player and everything worked fine at first but now it won’t play my CD’s anymore. The FM and Bluetooth functions work fine so I know the batteries aren’t dead, and I tried lots of different CD’s so I know it’s not them.. I’m not sure what’s going on. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little CD/radio for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the sound quality; I had assumed that since it is so small, it would be "tinny", but it's quite robust. The main reason I bought it was its compact size, to put on my overcrowded bedside table. It's perfect for that. One tip you might use-- when you unpack it and set it up, be sure the volume is turned up. For a few moments, I thought the unit was defective, but it was just the volume knob all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: carol author

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This CD player simply stopped working after 3 months of use. The sound quality isn’t great but we just used it to play a CD of lullabies for our newborn, so we weren’t too picky. We never moved, hit, dropped, or even picked up this CD player and yet it totally stopped working one day. It seems to be too late to return. So frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: It is simple enough for her to operate easily (of course she is a sharp lady)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an 80-something lady in the nursing home so she could use headphones and CDs to get some peaceful escape time. It is simple enough for her to operate easily (of course she is a sharp lady). It is small -- doesn't use up her small amount of nightstand space. The sound quality had a bit of static with the headphone on. I don't think she hears well enough to notice, but most of us would not like that. She's had it for a month now, and it all still works.
customer_reviews.author: Taeio Teague

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product, do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The product died before a year of use. The CD player stopped working after 7 months, after that I was able to use the player to connect my phone and use the speakers but about 10 months after buying the product nothing works anymore. It turns on but the radio, aux input, Bluetooth don't work. Would not recommend product to anyone. I bought 3 of this stereos and only 1 of them is currently working. Really cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Looked good, but not functional
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple, small, CD player with an added bonus of radio and alarm. This looked like the best option. I opened the package- played a CD- it played for 30 seconds then stopped. Started it again and it skipped and stopped. The sound quality fair. So it looks like a great product in theory, but didn’t work out. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Features stopped working after a month.
customer_reviews.text: The CD player stopped functioning after a month of use. I am especially disappointed by this as the main reason I bought this is for the CD feature, so that I can put on my kid's lullabies at night. The radio and blue tooth still work, but it defeats the purpose of having a CD function.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E Kearney

customer_reviews.title: DOA. CD won't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read all of the reviews instead of just the ones at the top. The CD player won't work at all. Did everything in the manual. It tells how many tracks there are, then you push play and nothing happens and the play light won't come on. Waste of time and money. This seller should be removed.
customer_reviews.author: K. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and compact which is what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This product last 2 1/2 years with minimal use before it broke completely. It is nice and compact which is what I wanted. The volume control is counterintuitive by requring you to roll the volume up to turn it down, and then to roll the volume down in order to turn it up. This was used once or twice a month for a CD, so I was hoping it would last longer. Started with the radio not working, then more and more CDs seemed to skip. Finally, the power would no longer turn on.
customer_reviews.author: RubySparkles

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it stopped working within a month. I received a replacement. It stopped working a month and a half after receiving it . Unfortunately, it was past the 30 day return policy. I am still waiting for a response to my emails. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia...

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious when buying some electronics thru the mail.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get it to play. It kept saying there was no cd in the device. So was force to return it. Positive: it was easy to do. Just printed label and took to UPS. Negative : I have not received refund and it was mailed over 2 weeks ago. Will refrain from buying some electronic thru the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This little gem has surprisingly good sound and build. It's easy to use, especially if you take a minute to read the accompanying instructions. I LOVE the fact that it has such a small footprint; it sits easily atop the table next to my reading chair. It has all the necessary functions (including X-Bass) and nice eye appeal. Great value! BOTTOM LINE: Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: C. HawkinsTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: This was a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this broke within 2 months of use. This one was a lemon because the other 3 I bought are still going strong. And the return window was shrunk because I got this for Christmas and it sat wrapped for a while. I'm really frustrated because I paid good money for it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly great but with modification gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play audiobooks in the car. Not great. I needs an adaptor to plug into the cigarette lighter and my Mercedes Metro bluetooth cannot synch with it so I had to buy a cord to plug into the car speakers. So, after two additional purchases that were more than the initial purchase I can play CDs. It plays, but skips on occasion. Not nearly as good as a real CD player... Kind of wish I went with a different one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Won't play discs all the way through
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our child to listen to audio books, unfortunately only plays discs for a short time (like 20 minutes) and quits. It is not the discs; we have tried multiples. Now we are past the return AND customer support window so it is just a loss. I hate things like that. Looks brand new but could only be used for a radio, which is not what we bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: KEC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect little cd player/radio for my sunroom. I had no trouble getting the cd in and out (as described as a problem in some reviews). The sound is good and the controls are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size, not good sound for a Jensen
customer_reviews.text: With the Jensen name, I would have expected a bit better sound quality. I bought one of these for my father and he loved it, so I bought myself one since the only way I have to play CD's at home is through my computer. I wanted better portability. It is a nice little player and easily operated. Blue tooth hooked up seamlessly. But the sound quality is a bit disappointing. Ok for $41 player I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Moore

customer_reviews.title: know your warranty on a product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased boom box to listen to audio books OCTOBER 2019. It stop reading disc February 2020. Warranty was for only 30 days. Called Amazon said I had to contact Jenson well no progress with them, I'm very disappointed in product and service contact.
customer_reviews.author: barbara a mcpeters

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 players for my 11 yr olds for Christmas in 2018. They love them and use them every day to listen to music from their devices. At night they play a sleep CD. We have been happy with them until this week. The CD player on both units broke. The CDs just spin and won't play. So, for about 1.5 years we have been very happy but now we need new CD players. Wont rebuy these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.  Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3, 1 black and 2 white. Love these little cd players. Very nice for being so small. Good sound quality. Love that they don't take up much space and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: We've had 2 units, both broke within one year
customer_reviews.text: Great until they break! With the first one, the CD drive stopped functioning. With the second one the power supply connection on the back would no longer connect to the supply cable. I tried replacing the cable and it was not the cable but the part on the device. Very expensive to last only one year!
customer_reviews.author: Knk

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality problems!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little player. Unfortunately the CD player does not work well after just 3 weeks of use. Now there is a "crrrrrrr" background noise with any CD. I cleaned the lens but it still makes the noise. The Bluetooth and FM radio work fine without any problems. You pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The perfect portable!! Easily 5+ stars!
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome CD radio!! The sound quality is much better than expected. Very happy with the sound! I use it in my baby son's room for lullabies and the CD motor is extremely quiet so you don't even notice it at extremely low volumes. I got the blue color and love the way it looks, very fun for a child's room. And it's super small, taking up much less space than the Sony boombox I had in there before... And I like the sound of this better. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: cafe80s

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is terrible. It will not play a CD. It skips every other word. It is so cheap. I just wish I would have spent a little more money and got one that actually worked. It skips CDs so bad that it wakes my daughter up. I’ve even purchased brand new CDs for thinking maybe it’s just all my cds. Nope.
customer_reviews.author: 1innome

customer_reviews.title: Love this little gem!!
customer_reviews.text: This teeny tiny sound box has been accompanying my dance classes for a month or two now and it's perfect! The machine plugs into my studio's sound system, is easy to use and travels around in my bag with no trouble and uses up almost no space. The sound is good on it's own when I use it at home to plan classes and the radio is also great. Love it and highly recommend it for quality, ease of use and cuteness!
customer_reviews.author: Diana MacNeil

customer_reviews.title: Great size; but CD PLAYER DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase. It may look awesome and it does have great sound BUT the CD player does not work...at all. 🤨 The CD player is the reason why I purchased it. The first time I used it, it worked. Months later, after not a lot of use, the CD player just keeps turning and won't play. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisy

customer_reviews.title: CD Player Not Working
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my office to listen to CD's and music through my apple watch. Bluetooth works but the CD player does not work right out of the box. I have tried four different CD's and they are the actual CD not burned copies. If I wanted just the Bluetooth feature I would have purchased a Bluetooth speaker. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan G

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  Poor sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: My wife still likes to listen to cd's, so I thought this would perfect for the kitchen. The item had a nice look and feel and it was super easy to connect with Bluetooth. Unfortunately, the sound was utter garbage. It would play fine at low volume, but anything at a decent hearing level was distorted. So, if you like to listen to your music at a whisper level, this boombox is for you. Otherwise....move on. We ended up going with a Sony ZS-RS60BT, which was found elsewhere for $38.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rokk

customer_reviews.title: cannot read and play cds
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact design. Ordered it the first time but it got lost on the way and Amazon had to reorder and replace it! Unfortunately, it did not work! It could not read and play even after a cd was inserted (tried different cds). Quite disappointed and have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Svenson

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Wire antenna broke after 1 week, did not get good reception anyway! You better have good hearing because this thing hasn't got much volume. Turn it up and lots of distortion. Not worth even $10. Sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Portable, Decent Sound Quality For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This little sound box is just what I needed and the price was right. I mainly use it to play music for patients who need a bit of cheering up or who respond better to music than to conversation, but it also comes in handy on road trips or to take up to the cabin. It's lightweight and the little handle makes it easy to carry. It's great to have the versatility of CD or mp3, plus you have the option of using batteries or plugging it in. The sound quality is decent for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Random Blogger

customer_reviews.title: Great little boom box
customer_reviews.text: This was an anniversary gift for my husband. He uses it in the garage and streams from his phone with it. It's very simple to activate the Bluetooth. Put the boom box on Bluetooth mode and then go into your smart phone settings to Bluetooth. There should be an option to search for connections at which point you should see this particular item's Bluetooth. Tap it to connect and then go to Pandora or whatever you use and it will magically play out of your boom box! We are taking on vacation in a few days as well. It take 6 C batteries! Hopefully it holds for a long time, we'll see!
customer_reviews.author: LadyS

customer_reviews.title: Does not last. Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not use the CD player on this product only a few times (less than 10), and it no longer works. I had listened to a CD & changed to a different CD and it will not play. I put the other CD back in that I had listened to because I knew it worked in the player, and it does not play. The CD never starts spinning to be read to listen to it. Very disappointed in this product and feel as I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Beaty

customer_reviews.title: A great CD player - why make it a speaker?
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this little CD player - it's bright pink color, portability, easy to use, and sound quality. It's nice that it can be a speaker for your phone, but that's not what I understood when I read "Bluetooth" ability on the box. I thought I could listen to my CDs with my "wireless" headphones! No way! I didn't buy a CD player so I could use it as a speaker. That's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: decs7jim3

customer_reviews.title: CD player did not work. Seller should not have re-sold defective product.
customer_reviews.text: CD player did not work. Never worked, as far as I can tell. It was obvious that I was not the first person to receive the item from the seller. The unit arrived in box, unwrapped, power cord and manufacturer's plastic bags wadded inside box. Seller should have checked reason for former return, should not have resold defective product. THANKS FOR WASTING MY TIME!
customer_reviews.author: N. Kautz

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked as CD player for 2 weeks, but then stopped. Just blinks.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Crews

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use nice small size Good sound CD player and Radio.
customer_reviews.text: I basically bought this to listen to audio books when I am in bed. Love to read or listen to a book before bedtime. This is a nice small unit, I out in on my lamp table by the bed. It sounds good and is easy to use. It does have some trouble reading some cds. It will stop and not read a track or not recognize a cd.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Cappetto

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Better companies make better similar products
customer_reviews.text: Two units that I have owned have had malfunction in the AC input and can only be powered with batteries. Not durable. Not worth the money. Better products are available from other companies at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Harris

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing but was HOPING for a better result. The CD portion 2 stopped working within 2 weeks. I purchased it for CD use only. Did not realize that there is a "return window" of 30 days and I missed it. Very disappointing so watch your dates if you purchase any Jensen product. I also purchased a personal Jensen CD player from another website with a 90 day return window.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing sound quality. We are not at all happy with this, I expected much better sound.
customer_reviews.author: wegenerb

customer_reviews.title: Below average
customer_reviews.text: This unit does not hold a signal when on radio or Bluetooth. It continually cuts out. Also, the sound quality is below average. This was the only unit I could find that had radio, Bluetooth, and CD player. Not sure it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CD player doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to play CDs. The CD function doesn't work. It doesn't recognize when a CD is loaded and won't play them. I read the instruction manual and followed the troubleshooting instructions carefully but no dice. The radio feature worked fine, but half of the product is defective. It's too bad, because the stereo itself, although not super-high quality, is cute and the size would have been perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: KU

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a little cube at that price.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted FM radio and CD options for the backyard gatherings and basement hobby area, but didn't want to spend a lot. I'm DELIGHTED with the sound quality and options on this cute little compact cube and I'm using it much more than I thought I would. My teenage grandson stopped by last week and commended me on this purchase, as he has the same one at home and loves his too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lalley

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a quality cd player for the price, good sound for what it is, I don’t expect High end acoustics. Otherwise it is quality. No mechanical hissing, also there is no balance adjustments. You can only boost with bass or not. Still if your looking for something for a room or travel, this is fine, above average.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Player and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Many of the reviews scared me, but the price was low, so I figured what the heck. The player turned out to be terrific. The sound could be a little stronger, but the depth of sound is good, and the player is exceptionally easy to use. It's a tight little box that takes up just a spot on my patio table and provides nice music for a summer evening.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: CD player didn’t work day 1
customer_reviews.text: I bought to listen to books on CD. The radio part was fine, but tried to play a CD and the fun ended. I read the instructions several times to see if there was a trick; cleaned the CD; tried a music CD and then gave up and returned. To me it was defective and useless. Darn!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Surprised actually!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised bat how good the sound is from such a small box. Very happy with the price for a lot of sound. Has every setting needed. Easy to use. No pull up telescopinhg antenna for the radio function to get broken off or be in the way. Has a 20" wire rolled up antenna. Worked very wellm and is out of sight behingd radion on shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Glock

customer_reviews.title: CD PLAYER
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these awhile back. I have trouble getting to sleep and staying asleep due to tinnitus. I use it for audio books on cd. In the past I used portable cd players and spent a fortune on batteries. As I said I bought one awhile back and I like it so much I bought a second one. Because it is a limited edition I wanted to make sure if my first one quit I would have a backup. It doesn't take a lot of room on my nightstand and it looks ok as well. I have not used the radio so I can't comment on that feature. Basically I have to say I love it.
customer_reviews.author: sandra kaye

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Bought for my toddler’s room to play cds and connect with my phone for musical variety. Was not expecting the quality of sound and easy functionality. Operating for 1 day so far and I will update if necessary as I read some reviews of people who had trouble after a few months. So far, super awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Toby's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Day 1 Fast-forward did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, from Day One, the fast forward function did not work, so I sent it back. If it hadn't been for that, I would have loved it. I loved the size, sound, design, portability & ease of use. Boo hoo! Seems like no body makes a good, reliable CD player.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: The product functions as required. It’s cute and reasonably compact. The sound quality is not great—a bit tinny—but it is adequate for the small space it will be used in. It was a hit as a gift largely because it fit the pink color scheme of the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Superb radio reception!
customer_reviews.text: Compact & attractive but most of all excellent FM radio reception. Of course CD player works fine too. Beyond expectations. Bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my small home
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have the greatest sound but that's ok, it plays my old CDs. However, I wish I could connect it to my BOSE mini speaker. Unfortunately, the Bluetooth only connect to a phone not a portable speaker. Check my Instagram@ThriftersLookBook or YouTube NaturallyMeMya to check all my honest and unsponsored reviews and money saving tips😜
customer_reviews.author: NaturallyMeMya

customer_reviews.title: It never worked at all.
customer_reviews.text: It did not work from the start. Never got one complete cd played before it died. I would not get up to speed with the spin or it did not recognize there was a cd in the machine. get up to speed with the spin or it did not recognize there was a cd in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ollimbo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, only worked for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Compact, sleek appearance. Worked as expected for about 3 weeks, then only sound it produced was not music but constant roar of static interspersed with loud popping noises.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes a lot of white noise while listening
customer_reviews.text: Not a great purchase. Sometimes, we get a lot of white noise from the speakers, that can solved by slapping the top of the player. Probably a bad wiring or something. beside that, it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: loranfrfr

customer_reviews.title: Works but not in cold
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife’s car after auto CD player broke. It worked fine till winter. Works inside house but not in car in winter. She’ll try again in spring.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D. Janzow

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the reviews that said this CD player would not last. It Worked for only a month then the cd started skipping consistently. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Juliane Sortomme

customer_reviews.title: Motor for CD player stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for about 6 months. Good sound quality, nice size. Bought it specifically for playing CDs but the motor stopped working today (August 22) and I bought it back in February of this year. With as old as the technology is for CD players this is part of this machine that they should have perfected.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great CD player
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used this for my daughter’s CDs that come with books. But it has worked great so far. It’s hard to find CD players these days and this one was a fair price when we purchased it and seems to be living up to its claims. No issues. Good quality sound. Good options for playing different music inputs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cd player in January 2018. It is now August 2018. About a month ago, the power switch stopped working so I had to leave it turned on all the time and just press the play button when I wanted to use it. It's now just stopped playing cd's entirely. It's just a bit pricey to have only lasted 8 months. It was fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is high quality, excellent sound for such a compact player. I got it for my grandson, but it's suitable for anyone. I highly recommend. I will be getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: LArnold

customer_reviews.title: NEVER WORKED RIGHT FROM DAY 1!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE OF THIS PIECE OF JUNK! I should have listened to the bad reviews. The CD player skipped and the speaker crackled right out of the box. Bluetooth never worked, and the sound is awful!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Color Description
customer_reviews.text: I admit, I didn't scroll down to read reviews or look at pictures. I saw that this product had many good reviews and chose a color based on the choices given. I NEVER would have chosen the color WHITE but that is what I got because I ordered "SILVER." I thought the product would be SILVER wth a little white but it is the other way around. I don't even wanna review the product otherwise, now. Misleading description leading to a disappointing purchase is not my favorite thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this cd player
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for carrying around the house or yard and listening to cds. I didn't try the blue tooth, so i can't speak about that. buttons and lights all work well. seems sturdy enough. i really like it and i'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee M.

customer_reviews.title: Will this product last?
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm very pleased with this product. I may sound like I'm skeptical because I recently I bought a Memorex boom box CD player and after 3 months it died. Amazon took it back. The sound is excellent on the Jenson. It's small and light and can easily be carried around from place to place. I didn't put anything in for "durability" because I can't tell now. If it lasts, it is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend.
customer_reviews.text: This little powerhouse is my new friend. I almost didn't buy it because of some of the reviews. But i checked on everything when it arrived. All was in good working order. It's been week. If it continues to work then we're buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lotane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device for a bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: The size makes it portable & small enough to fit into limited space. The sound quality is as good or better than radios/CD players costing much more. And the price? Unbelievably fair! An all around good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 6 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: This CD player lasted almost exactly 6 months and died. Power comes on but the CD player nor the radio come on. Very disappointing for my daughter who used it to listen to audio books. :(((
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Moore

product_meta.title: Jensen CD-555 Red CD Bluetooth Boombox Portable Bluetooth Music System with CD Player +CD-R/RW & FM Radio with Aux-in & Headphone Jack Line-in Limited Edition- (Red)
